sentences.sContent: The financial crisis devitalized the economy of the Asian countries.
sentences.sContent_eng: The financial crisis devitalized the economy of the Asian countries.
sentences.sCn: 这次金融危机使亚洲国家的经济大伤元气。

sentences.sContent: The government predicates that the market collapse was caused by Asian financial crisis.
sentences.sContent_eng: The government predicates that the market collapse was caused by Asian financial crisis.
sentences.sCn: 政府宣布市场不景气是由于亚洲金融危机而引起的。

trans.tranOther: from or relating to Asia, especially India or Pakistan
someone from Asia, or whose family originally came from Asia, especially India or Pakistan
